thread.section_title: Chewy.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chewy.com | chewy.com
thread.title: Sylvie La Roche
thread.title_full: Chewy.com reviewed by Sylvie La Roche

author: Sylvie La Roche
title: Sylvie La Roche
text:
I haven't have a better experience returning something!!! I needed to return a travel bag that it was too little for my dog. It was easy and....they asked me to donate the bag to a dogs shelter
Wow!! I am impressed!! I will continue buying from you!!!
I consider the service very good, quickly, costumer service amazing and I recommend them 100%.
